summary: We audit the U.S. government's consolidated financial statements annually. Ongoing problems prevent us from determining whether the statements fairly present the government's finances. In our FY 2023 audit, we found that Treasury and OMB improved processes for preparing the financial statements, including addressing three of our recommendations related to the analysis of agencies' financial data. We did not make any new recommendations in this report...
title: U.S. Consolidated Financial Statements: Continued Improvements Needed in Treasury and OMB Preparation Process Controls
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
